conversations: When I went under, the world was at war. I wake up, they say we won. They didn't say what we lost
We need a plan of attack
I don't want to kill anyone, but I don't like bullies; I don't care where they're from
We may not perfect, but the safest hands are still our own
How do we know the good guys from the bad guys?
If they’re shooting at you, they’re bad
Some people move on. But not us… Not us
